comment.body:
> I don't see a player without AdGuard. You have too much filters - which one breaks the site?

@Alex-302 

Here is what I did to investigate the source of the issue.
First I disabled all the filters. The video plays!
If I enable any of these filters alone, I see an empty space instead:

AdGuard Base filters
AdGuard Mobile Ads filter
AdGuard Tracking Protection filter
AdGuard French filter

Of the filters that I have enabled, these are the ones which don't seem to be causing the issue:

AdGuard URL Tracking filter
AdGuard Social Media filter
AdGuard Cookie Notices filter
AdGuard Popups filter
AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter
AdGuard Other Annoyances filter
AdGuard Widgets filter
Online Malicious URL Blocklist
NoCoin Filter list
Other Language filters

The first four filters mentioned are causing the issue. You have to check all four of them.
I hope this research does help. Good luck!

issue.title: www.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Up06CryWQpE](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DUp06CryWQpE) ### Comment Username: @Grandpat-Star > When I try to watch the official music video for Strawberry Wine by Deana Carter Official the adblock has not worked since last night. I have tried reloading and ads show up. When I have tried reloading other videos such as Introducing LEGO Braille Bricks – Play with Braille by Lego official, and the official audio for The Wrong Girl (Greatest Hits Version) by Lee Ann Womack Official the ads are not there. This seems to be contained to this specific video. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V2kRxZr6b9s](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DV2kRxZr6b9s) ### Comment > I entered youtube (weirdly downloads thumbnails of videos on page and other layout), I click on a video at top. It doesn't play the video -- either showing black screen video or tells me I'm not connected to the internet. > If I disable Adguard, youtube comes back fully functional, but with ads. :\ > Worth noting, this issue only happened after I updated Adguard yesterday to the latest version. Filters are also up-to-date. ### Screenshots
